author: danielf
msg: Bug fix for the RequestProcessor and use the context listener setup of the Cocoon Spring bean factory as default. I know that it is a little bit early to use it as default, but it seem to work, and I think it deserves to get more heavy testing.

author: janb
msg: jetty and jetty-builder modules compile and the tests work except for security, as the SecurityHandler and other BeforeAfter
interceptors have not been brought into line with jetty6; can't build console-jetty as there is something wrong with the schema conversion
